comments.body: So it would be `readonly resourceLimits: Partial<ResourceLimits>;`?
no, `ResourceLimits` should be changed to all properties optional. This matches in both cases.
I think `URL` needs to be imported.
We shouldn't have to, it's a global in node, I willl look into that but I feel like we've already had this issue.

it's once again an issue with DOM.
Refs: https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/25356
Refs: https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/issues/25342
It's also that we cannot re-export types as globals...
